name: contracts
description: Smart contracts and tests for Onit accounts
author: Onit Labs Ltd

scripts.test: forge test $(if [ $1 != '' ]; then echo '--match-test' $1  ; fi) $(if [ $2 != '' ]; then echo '-vvvv'; else '-vvv'  ; fi);
scripts.deploy: forge script script/deploy/$1.s.sol:$1 --rpc-url $(grep $2'_RPC_URL' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --chain-id $(grep $2'_CHAIN_ID' .env | cut -d '=' -f2)  --private-key $(grep $2'_PRIVATE_KEY' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --etherscan-api-key  $(grep $2'_EXPLORER_API_KEY' .env | cut -d '=' -f2) $(if [ $3 = 'b' ]; then echo '--verify --broadcast --legacy'; fi);
